# 图床api:

## 请求：

curl 'https://upup.liangdabiao.com/upload' \
  -H 'accept: application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01' \
  -H 'accept-language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.9' \
  -H 'content-type: multipart/form-data; boundary=----WebKitFormBoundarySpuPcO66NGRi8Ryv' \
  -b 'XSRF-%3D; lsky_pro_%3D' \
  -H 'origin: https://upup.liangdabiao.com' \
  -H 'priority: u=1, i' \
  -H 'referer: https://upup.liangdabiao.com/' \
  -H 'sec-ch-ua: "Not:A-Brand";v="99", "Google Chrome";v="145", "Chromium";v="145"' \
  -H 'sec-ch-ua-mobile: ?0' \
  -H 'sec-ch-ua-platform: "Windows"' \
  -H 'sec-fetch-dest: empty' \
  -H 'sec-fetch-mode: cors' \
  -H 'sec-fetch-site: same-origin' \
  -H 'user-agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/145.0.0.0 Safari/537.36' \
  -H 'x-csrf-token: FXFmnjBsEE4lWLI8ms7FYpfxSlvbyhTCXK3YBHdS' \
  -H 'x-requested-with: XMLHttpRequest' \
  --data-raw $'------WebKitFormBoundarySpuPcO66NGRi8Ryv\r\nContent-Disposition: form-data; name="strategy_id"\r\n\r\n1\r\n------WebKitFormBoundarySpuPcO66NGRi8Ryv\r\nContent-Disposition: form-data; name="file"; filename="bead-grid-100x56-keys-palette_MARD.png"\r\nContent-Type: image/png\r\n\r\n\r\n------WebKitFormBoundarySpuPcO66NGRi8Ryv--\r\n'
